title: Interactive Remote Science Education: Mobile Microlearning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Interactive remote education course for understanding science concepts in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments. Current elementary school teachers (30s) participate as learners while in administrative roles.

learning_goals: Through interactive quizzes on mobile platforms, learners can explain science experiment principles with 90% accuracy
Using remote collaboration tools, learners can design and share virtual experiment scenarios with peers
Within one week, learners can apply basic science concepts by completing daily 15-minute microlearning modules

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
